name: Wiskers
description: Wiskers allows users to execute advanced trading strategies simply, using their alerts on TradingView, Wiskers sends the corresponding action to their Ethereum wallets to execute the trade on a DEX. Wiskers will go far beyond TradingView. Blockchain alerting services open up wiskers to be used in very creative ways. Wiskers will make any contract function or combination of them a executable action on-chain.
